channel.title: Partnership on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Partnership on FinanClub

item.title: DISH
item.description: score:771 Chances: Charlie Ergen is nearing a deal to merge Dish Network and EchoStar for a nationwide wireless network. DISH Network partners with Amazon to sell Boost Infinite wireless plans to Prime members. Risks: Uncertainties related to the successful completion of the merger between Dish Network and EchoStar.

item.title: AFRM
item.description: score:1298 Chances: Affirm’s upcoming publication of its Q4 and fiscal year 2023 shareholder letter, financial results, and conference call may provide insights into the company’s performance and strategic outlook. Affirm’s partnership with Cathay Pacific to become its exclusive U.S. pay-over-time partner could open new growth opportunities in the airline industry.

item.title: BBD
item.description: score:883 Chances: Banco Bradesco SA is partnering with Amazon.com to launch a credit card offering in Brazil, expanding the bank’s fintech offerings. The launch of the credit card is expected next week and will be managed by Banco Bradesco, powered by Mastercard. The collaboration with Amazon.

item.title: IONQ
item.description: score:1058 Chances: IonQ’s leadership in the quantum computing industry positions the company well to capitalize on the growing demand for advanced computing solutions. The partnership with South Korea’s Ministry of Science and ICT reflects IonQ’s commitment to education and the development of a local quantum ecosystem, potentially expanding its market presence.
